channel.title: [Release] NOOBscape V3
channel.description:
A lot of people was asking me to release a third version, and a lot of people was asking about changing the quest name green within the quest tab, so here's something I threw together. This features all of V2 updates, plus the following:
1. Sounds. As V1 and V2 didn't have the sounds, I decided to throw them into this one. Forgot the name of the kid/guy who originally posted the sounds.
2. Crowns. I added in 5 new crown colors in case you decide you want to add a few more ranks. The colors are: Red, Black, Orange, Pink and Rainbow. * Red Crown - #red# * Black Crown - #blk# * Orange Crown - #orn# * Rainbow Crown - #rin# * Pink Crown - #pnk#
3. Info Tab has been changed into a Quest Tab, and a further tab was created to implement a Combat Tab.
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/2005pgh.png[/img]
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/aemq2c.png[/img]
4. The report/commands button has been changed into a say/clan chat history tab. You can also see from the screenshot provided that the staff crowns will also appear next to staff names when they use the say command.
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ds1xkz.png[/img]
5. 7 Quests added. They are the ones that appear in the tab above.
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/25yxjex.png[/img]
6. Wielding of god staffs/capes has been updated. You can no longer wield a Zamorak/Saradomin cape when wielding the Guthix staff, and vice versa.
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/o1xl3.png[/img]
7. You can no longer cast god spells outside the Mage Arena unless you have cast the spell 100 times inside the arena.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/sfdmwm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/209fswj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/24x002e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/jq6fcx.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/v33h40.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/jkax7c.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/nxrvgh.png[/img]
8. You will need to be wearing both the cape and the staff to cast the god spells.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/dzus6r.png[/img]
9. Killing Spree: If you kill someone, you will gain +1 killing spree. If you get killed, your killing spree will be reset to 0. Every 5 killing spree gained, a message will be displayed to all players online, and a new killing spree rank will be given. By default (0 killing spree), the rank will be "No Rank".
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ptp3wz.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/1zbxevm.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2vwh56d.png[/img]
10. Mute fixed. I noticed that this wasn't fixed in V2. It will now work and also muted players will not be able to communicate with anyone apart from staff. They can not use the say command, and they can no longer use the private messages. It also means that if you try to communicate with a muted player, you can no longer private message them either.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/98c1tj.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/33n9107.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2n6gf44.png[/img]
11. A few new commands added. They are: * ::spree <username> // Displays the <username>'s killing spree * ::wild // Displays the amount of players that are currently in the wilderness * ::setstat <stat> <amount> // Sets your stats. Can't set them below 1 or above 99 * ::reset <username> <stat> <amount> // Resets another players stats (combat stats only) if the stat is below 40 * ::promote <username> <rankid> // Promotes the username to a specific rank * ::invisible // Makes you invisible to nearby players
Note: The invisible command is by far complete, but it will go invisible.
The rank IDs for the promotion command are the same rank that corresponds from the CFG files.
Admin -- 4 Mod -- 3 PMod -- 2 Event Staff - 7
12. Druidic Ritual Quest rewrote. You will now need to dip the meats into the cauldron.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ra7p7n.png[/img]
13. Cook's Range. This will only be usable once you have completed the cook's assistant quest. By using his range, you will gain double EXP.
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/n3m80z.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/dbmc5v.png[/img]
14. Chat Filter added to the say command. You can edit what words are filtered by increasing the String in the CommandHandler.java
[code] public static String[] cussingWords = {"fuck"}; // Add words to be filtered here [/code]
If anyone has any questions about this shit, just post here. I will gladly provide any support for this release.
Download Link: http://uppit.com/v/LGF5M4ZP

yong min should release server :P:P:P he only good coder left in rsc p servers:P:P

[/quote]No, I’m going to have to guess that that’s not true. I’m sure that there’s at least one better programmer that’s still in RSC p servers, like xEnt for example, plus you’d have no way of knowing whether people are good programmers and working on private servers… privately, without releasing any info to the general public.[/quote]

no way man, yong min has the talent, he can outcode xEnt anyday. He teEchEs all us noobs how to program p servers, hes the only good p server coder in rsc community tbh, if not how i prove wat i wrong?

item.title: [Release] NOOBscape V3
item.dc:creator: @kaspa121 kaspa121
item.description:
@kaspa121 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:54, topic:328862”][quote author=kaspa121 link=topic=425255.msg3420600#msg3420600 date=1291484158]

Urm ive just made my own rsc server using the divinepk source how do i attacth this to my pserver?

Attach what exactly?

Nvm, urm this is amazing world very very impressive just a couple of questions sir, One the buy/Sell function in any shop around the map is not working do you have any idea’s on how to fix this?
I’ve sent you a private message with my MSN details ect if you could add me i would be more than grateful.

Make sure the base price of the items are identical both client and server side.

yong min can you please add my msn ill pay you for the help you provide me… deanobeanoyee@hotmail.com thanks please add me -.- ive been waiting all day for you to log on
[/quote]

I will add you in 30 mins or so after i’ve sent some work related emails. I don’t want your money/payment either.[/quote]are you serious? WOW Thank you so much your like a gaurdian angel

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] NOOBscape V3
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

[quote=“showpath, post:42, topic:328862”]a few bugs if you choose remove (the bank one) on the control panel it adds items still
the ranks (player rights) are kinda messed up
and what is the npc id for the gambler because there are no npcs named gambler
edit
if i change npc drops they dont work[/quote]

I did not touch the control panel in anyway. If you have issues with that, it was a bug from the original base that was created by xEnt.

How are the ranks messed up? Explain more detail about this. As pomp said, you can declare any NPC ID with an npchandler. Also, when you chance the drops, make sure you have changed them client side too.

Read full topic

the ranks (player rights) are kinda messed up
and what is the npc id for the gambler because there are no npcs named gambler
edit
if i change npc drops they dont work[/quote]

Npc id for gambler is what ever u choose…
The npc drops must be an error on your part aswell.
You can easily change ranks and player rights.
and yeah that is messed up.

What do you want from him? You want him to do everything for you?

All the stuff you named is something you should be able to fix yourself…

Read full topic
